alert.note: Alert for Coastal Del Norte (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Watch issued January 29 at 2:16PM PST until January 31 at 4:00PM PST by NWS Eureka
info.description: .A strong atmospheric river is expected to bring heavy rain Tuesday afternoon through early Thursday morngSix to tenng. ...FLOOD WATCH IN EFFECT FROM LATE TUESDAY NIGHT THROUGH THURSDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is possible. * WHERE...A portion of northwest California, including the following areas, Coastal Del Norte, Del Norte Interior, Northern Humboldt Interior and Southern Humboldt Interior. * WHEN...From late Tuesday night through Thursday morning. * IMPACTS...There will be an increased risk of rock and land slides along roadways. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - Three to six inches of rain is expected late Tuesday night through Wednesday night. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: You should monitor later forecasts and be alert for possible Flood Warnings. Those living in areas prone to flooding should be prepared to take action should flooding develop.
